author: Brian Koerber
title: Elderly man helps couple take a romantic photo and fails brilliantly
text:
This man is either a brilliant troll or helplessly hilarious.
According to Redditor Tyguy462 , a sweet old man approached him and his wife on the beach and offered to take their photo.
SEE ALSO: You can now take selfies... with your feet?
Sweet old man at the beach: "Would you like me to take a photo of you two love birds?" My wife: "Yes please!" Nailed it. from funny
The old man instead took a low selfie, capturing the image of the happy couple in the reflection of his sunglasses. Anyone who has tried to take a photo and opened up their camera app only to see the underside of their chin knows the feeling.
WATCH: The BBC interview kids just stole the show again
